radiographic_examinations.findings: Marked inflammatory fat stranding in the pericecal area with a large soft tissue mass measuring 3.2 x 5.4 cm and demonstrating areas of low attenuation approximately 28.5 Hounsfield units. The appendix is not visualized as a separate structure to this mass. Terminal ileum shows bowel wall thickening. No drainable fluid collection or abscess. Lung bases are clear without focal consolidation, pleural effusion, or pneumothorax. No intraperitoneal free air. Multiple prominent mesenteric and retroperitoneal lymph nodes noted.
